attributes.action: Nigel Farage brought us this referendum, he should lead the BREXIT negotiations.
attributes.background:
Brexit voters consist of many who consider Nigel Farage to be a key player in bringing this referendum. 

It would not be fair on voters to exclude Nigel from the negotiating table, we want him to lead the negotiations. 

Excluding Nigel is undemocratic given his involvement before anyone else.
